•Assign personnel who have the skills and time to carryout the activity effectively.
•Determine the cost and other resources  to carry outactivities.
Developing a workplan requires patience and time.  There
should be extensive discussions on what the priority activitiesare, how the activities will be carried out, who will beresponsible for the activities and how much of the availableresources should be spent on each activity.
